info.name: Legal AI API
info.description: Collection for testing Legal AI API endpoints

request.description:
Get current user information

Example Response:
```json
{
    "id": "67f967656557d4f1034a3c9f",
    "name": "John carter",
    "email": "john@example.com"
}
```

formdata.value: Sample trademark assignment document for testing

request.description:
Upload a document for analysis

Example Response:
```json
{
    "title": "Trademark Assignment Document",
    "description": "Sample trademark assignment document for testing",
    "id": "1",
    "file_path": "uploads/20250411_202301_20250403_180359_Trademark-Assignment.pdf",
    "file_type": "pdf",
    "status": "uploaded",
    "created_at": "2025-04-11T20:23:01.303344"
}
```
